about_the_game:
A military man who, drunk, signed up for an impossible task. So skillfully avoids dirty and hard work that he did not even learn how to shoot for all the time he served in the army. A lover of parties and girls seems to have gotten into trouble this time. But he's a good guy, help him get out.
The hero was sent on a mission from which they do not expect him to return. Single-handedly overthrow the dictatorship in a small island nation.
None of the superiors intended to interfere in the affairs of this island and no one knows about your presence there, so help is not to be expected.

Game with elements of different genres:
The visual novel takes you through the story of a military man who is left on an impossible mission on a small island nation so small that almost no one knows about it.
The arcade shooter will not let you get bored and will add a sense of presence and direct participation in what is happening.

Waiting for you:


5 interesting levels with different opponents.
Several types of weapons.
Quests from beautiful girls, for which the girls are ready to thank you.
Strong final boss.
An interesting story of an unsuccessful soldier.
Several plot options.
Beautiful girls who are ready to undress.
Interesting story.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains images of naked girls.
This game contains descriptions of sexual acts.
As missions are completed, the girls will become naked.
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.
There is no content about drugs, self-harm or suicide in the game.

name: Dictator-chan island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian
